headline.main: Health; THOSE GENES THAT TELL THE FUTURE

docs.abstract: Article by Dr Zsolt Harsanyi and Richard Hutton on ways scientists use 'genetic markers' to predict which individuals are predisposed to certain diseases; discusses moral, ethical and legal questions that could arise if extensive genetic screening is put into operation; illus (L)

byline.original: By Dr. Zsolt Harsanyi and Richard Hutton

docs.lead_paragraph: For centuries, schoolteachers on the Mediterranean island of Sardinia have witnessed a curious phenomenon. Every February, as spring arrives ...
